txt.en: 'Pippin is sleeping in our pavilion in Caras Galadhon.'
'I wish that Gandalf were here. I would feel much more courageous if he were with us.'
'Aragorn has not returned here to Cerin Amroth since we arrived.'
'Boromir has gone off by himself. I do not think he trusts the Elves here.'
'Legolas seems to enjoy showing off the beauty of Lothl√≥rien, especially to Gimli.'
